Plot: A criminal starts questioning his violent way of life when he searches for the unknown assailant who almost shot him to death.
Title: De Wederopstanding van een Klootzak
Writer: Bas Blokker (screenplay), Guido van Driel (graphic novel), Guido van Driel (screenplay)
Actors: Yorick van Wageningen, Goua Robert Grovogui, Juda Goslinga, René Groothof
